lines.name: CREW
lines.text: Hey, Marisha, it's happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not recording film.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) So this is just me doing a quick test-- man, that-- I don't know how helpful that is.

lines.name: CREW
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am so strong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mosquito.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Thank you guys so much for tuning in for this technical test.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Think we're already out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We will-- are we already out? Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got your coffee.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll be back for Critical Role in ten minutes if we're not already out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm Marisha Ray.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm Taliesin Jaffe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this has been--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A wonderful evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coming from Santa Monica.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ashley Johnson!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But she's returned, I believe. Like, returned-returned?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a while? So that's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we can't be sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She could die tonight.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would you say that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just saying!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just saying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take it back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike could possibly--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be really bad, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'd be really bad if suddenly Pike, like, 'welcome back,' and then Pike just explodes in the game. It'd be pretty bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spontaneous combustion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go check it out--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What your turn-ons are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't send those.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your social security number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've seen the fanart. We know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys. Let's see. Taliesin, Wednesday Club. What you got coming up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, Wednesday Club. We're finally-- Because I forgot that I was leaving town for some reason that I don't remember at all. I don't remember why I had to leave town for some reason.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Die. Just die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should bring a copy of Understanding Comics.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you should.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, Understanding Comics is going to be talked about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a really, really great book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead, check it out. She has a lot of awesome things to say. And thank you again, Satine, for doing that and being awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, Signal Boost! What's new?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guess who was on this week, you guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guy Lombardo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was our--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you say Don Pardo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guy Lombardo, but Don Pardo would've been amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. All great guesses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Foster Wayne Brian.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Foster Wayne Brian. Or Foster George Brian, as I think he was originally tagged. But Foster Wayne Brian, our very own, from Talks Machina. He was on. It's a very funny episode. A lot of us make cameos. He makes a cameo, you make a cameo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! You make a cameo. A lot of people make cameos.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did not sign any sort of waiver.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, you don't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say. I watched the episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Matt Key makes a cameo, sorry. Not you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So several funny ones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not him. But he does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I signed no waiver.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Thank you, Sam, for a cameo in the episode you don't remember.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We also took some of your semen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) On that note, I'm flying out tomorrow to be in Seattle, for Sakura-Con. I'll be there this weekend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've got awesome panels. Check out the-- Thank you. Travis is so excited.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just love Seattle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. 12th Man. Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So excited to be there at live panels, signings and a bunch of fun stuff. Check out their scheduling to make sure you can come and say hi to me. I'd like that a lot. So I'll see you guys up there tomorrow. Tomorrow. And of course we have Talks Machina coming up every Tuesday at 7PM Pacific here on Twitch and Alpha. We talk about whatever this episode is. And I think that's all we have announcement-wise, right, guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it? Was that it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, nice and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and we're still talking about the con we're doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: MomoCon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: MomoCon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. In Atlanta. At the end of May, May 25th through 28th. So me, Marisha and Taliesin will be there for that, too, in Atlanta.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have an announcement. I met Sara Bareilles this weekend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So jelly.

lines.name: CREW
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, one shriek!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was a woo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all. That was my whole announcement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She met her, like, in the flesh. You didn't cry, did you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did not cry. Some people that I were with did cry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I may have held onto her waist like this. Can you see my hand? I was like holding-- I didn't grab her boob, but I grabbed her waist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like mid-rib.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did creeper?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, like a real strong hug.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't go like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a real--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a real hug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't run away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't hover hand it. I didn't hover hand it, I put a hand on her waist.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hover hand, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And there's photographic evidence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There is photographic evidence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your life is complete.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's pretty badass. Well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back. So, as we last left off, Vox Machina had found themselves finishing up dangling loose threads after they had completed the destruction of the Chroma Conclave and essentially brought what seems to be, for the time being, peace to Tal'Dorei. You helped Keyleth complete her Aramente, where she was crowned the Voice of the Tempest. And you all had one wandering thread of Hotis, the rakshasa, which you have now killed twice and kept returning to the Nine Hells to recoup and threaten to come and slay and you and everything you love in the near future. So to cut that off at the head, you guys traveled to the second layer of Hell, the Iron City of Dis, to hunt down this rakshasa. After signing a contract with a devil, getting the proper information in this regard of where it was within the Bastion of Flesh in the subterranean prison known as Mentiri, you slaughtered a pit fiend named Utugash, and in response to that, as part of the contract, you were given passage into this prison with your equipment. You began a madcap rush through the prison, given the directions that you were presented as part of this deal you had made. You turned into a flock of bats, rushed in with a new friend, a dwarvish Blood Hunter, a werebear, particularly the Order of the Lycan--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all battled through the swath of chains that were binding and pulling you back as you all reached out to join hands in time for Keyleth to pull out her tuned fork to the Prime Material Plane and cast Plane Shift, and you all vanished into a familiar flash of whitish-green light. And that is where we left off. So, picking up where we left off. You all instantaneously feel the surge of magical energy burst through your body and all the chains that had tightened around, were threatening to crush your limbs and tear your body into a mass of crushed flesh and blood, release at once. And you have that familiar sense of floating and darkness once more. And you see that single bead of light ahead that grows larger and larger and larger, and that light becomes omnipresent, almost, in size, a familiar grid of divine fire and light. The Divine Gate, ancient and placed by the gods to seal both them, the betrayer gods, and any entities post-Divergence away. You transition once more through this lattice, impacting, the searing warmth just barely cresting the exterior of your form, leaving no damage to your soul, spirit, or physical body, but just enough to shake you as you pass through one of these small, porous holes in the gate itself. Glancing over your shoulder, you can see small little sparks that represent your friends who are traveling as well through this planar tunnel. As the lattice of the Divine Gate shifts and darkens behind you, you see a secondary small blue doorway come rocketing towards you all and suddenly your feet hit the ground. And as your eyes focus and look around, you are in the late afternoon, standing on the dirt ground, familiar scent, of a crisp, end-of-day Whitestone afternoon/evening. You guys are not at the Sun Tree. You are by the southern portion of it, not far from the farmhand who commissioned your portrait, Jameson. But the city is there before you. The streets aren't cluttered with people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not your portrait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know who that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Scanlan. Sorry. We're still getting over it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, that guy that played at your father's whatever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you all arrive, touch down, the familiar scent. The smiles come over you, knowing that you've managed to successfully return to a comfortable homestead. The sky is broken with clouds. But you can still see some of the dark blue behind it starting to turn purples and oranges, as the sun, though out of sight, is hitting dusk. A few people look over and glance and you hear whispers as people begin to recognize your arrival with a flashy spark of light and that slight Terminator-like slow rise from a crouch position as you all pull out of the other side of the portal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings Terminator theme)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we're all naked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is John Connor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you seen this boy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're fine. You're all still clothed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuuuu--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I had this feeling-- I felt like we were not going to get here. I felt like we were going to show up somewhere else. I don't know why.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a sight better than the Nine Hells.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could we have done that any closer to the razor's edge? I'm just saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth. Clutch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think all things considered, that went rather well. Taryon? Are you all right? Are you all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I'm fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is very reasonable not to be all right after that. I think I'm going to need a moment to sit down and have a drink--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pop Trinket out and I heal him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket pops out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! We're safe!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull out a bottle of something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And immediately goes from 'fierce bear' to 'I'm hurting, help me, mommy.'

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I'm going to do a spell, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guard laid down, the bear is just rubbing against you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a level three. I'm going to do it at level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The armor clinks and scrapes against you as the bits of fur which are matted with its own blood slowly heal as you touch the soft-- caress your fingers across the bear fur.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you fail a petting a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three ones?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trip ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You finish healing Trinket, somewhat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I wasn't even supposed to get three-- I'm only supposed to get two because it's a level three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well you still get two ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you not have a third-level spell left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I do have a 3rd-level spell so it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's at third level--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, yeah. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It works. Yeah, you're fine. So you finish healing. The wounds close somewhat and Trinket goes, (questioning growl).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I feel a little shaken up from that, I'm sorry. But you have some resting, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Licks the side of your cheek and is like-- (bear sounds) There is one 13-year-old kid off to the side that's watching this whole thing go down and just goes, "Is that your bear?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is. Why? Do you want to pet him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you do. Trinket, go show some love.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slow, slow, don't scare the boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good-- Happy love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The kid's trying to back up he's like, "Uh, uh."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean. Ooh--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't run, don't run! He attacks with his teeth if you run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, freeze. Nose up. Let him see your nose hairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see this scrawny boy is frozen in place and is partially trying to puff his chest but also is-- you can see him fighting the instinct to just run.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you hum to him, it soothes him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (tentative humming) This little-- young boy starts humming, and it's off-key but Trinket walks up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No-- There it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch that moment the eyes just go open wide and white before (slurps) up the side of the boy's face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's good that you hummed. It was really good. It was good humming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then Trinket turns around and shoulder checks him and knocks him onto his ass and walks back to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good nose action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30 seconds back in Tal'Dorei and we're tormenting people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, he liked it. It was sweet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's us. That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This trip has changed us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Human relations.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feels like old us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's nice not to hear screams of torment at all times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we've got a robot to reconstruct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going-- I will help with that. I've got a very, very large--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fine. You know, we-- adventurers lose people in battle all the time, right? And we have a-- it's nothing, right? It's totally normal. This happens all the time, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's actually quite painful and the hurt never goes away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pass the last of the Green Tear Whisky. For Dotty. Doty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For Doty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Dotty. D.T. Dotye.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No thank you, I'm not-- I don't know. I-- (sighs) He's-- I don't feel it would be right to celebrate right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not celebration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. How long did you have Do-oh-ty?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever lost him before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you lost anyone close to you before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I haven't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well then, you should know that that's not celebration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is acknowledgement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is coming to terms with a little bit of help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take a sip to Doty. My best friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your oldest friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My only friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To Doty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your oldest friend, not your only friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When you're ready, we'll fix one up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It won't be the same. I know it sounds silly, but I created him. And he's just mechanical, but I feel like he understood me better than anyone else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's not crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he listened probably better than anyone else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I could tell by his eyes that he sort of got it, he understood. Maybe I was just projecting, I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even if you were, it's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I suppose I could build another, it just won't feel the same. I-- (sighs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How else will you chronicle Doty's adventures if not with a new chronicler?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly. Doty will live on in your stories.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we'll fill in everything that's been missed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you're right, you're right, yes. With some resources and some time, and a little help, maybe I can build a new Doty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only when you're ready, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We definitely have resources, time, and help.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And also, don't need to party or anything, but three cheers to you. You just survived hell and back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I did, didn't I?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that on your list?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hell was not, but a revenge plot was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And this was a revenge, so I think we can tick that off. (sighs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How does it feel being such an accomplished adventurer now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I've been giving that a lot of thought, actually. In fact, if you will humor me, can I read you all something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Percy, pass the bottle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Drag the last of all the bottles out this time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're honoring Doty, I'd love to read to you the last thing that he wrote, well, transcribed before we went into the Hells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really excited to hear it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That'd be beautiful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But, if I had to, I'd say their friendship is "worth about 210,000 gold. Which, even to me, is a relatively large amount of money. Their faith "emboldens me." (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is out of character.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all for now, Doty. As always, correct my "grammatical errors before you rest and go fetch my sleep mask and nightshirt." And then we went to hell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was beautiful. That was--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eloquent, very eloquent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was a special, special robot and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- he was there for me in all of my darkest times and lightest times and now that he's not there anymore, I just-- I should feel very lonely, but I don't, because I am surrounded by people who truly respect me for who I am. And I know that in that last night before we went to the Hells I wrote that I was ready, finally, to go back and confront my father, but now in the absence of Doty, I've decided to put that aside and stay with you all. Yes, I feel my place is here with you, my rightful place. I won't have access to as much money, but everything else about me will stay the same. And I know that you are all happy that I've made this decision to stay with you as a now-poor adventurer. So maybe this is worth celebrating, I don't know, should we go have a drink in a pub or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we should.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we should.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question. What is a sleep mask?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like seeing lights at night, it wakes me out of my dream state, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it go over your whole head?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just my eyes and nose, just the top of the nose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the smallest of questions, though. The amount that you wrote down, would we be seeing that before you cut off ties?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think we should venture up there right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have adventuring to do, don't we? Things to help rebuild, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we may be here for a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may be taking a bit of a break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a funny moment in time when you met us, Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We had a bit of a list, we've had a couple lists, and we've checked an awful lot off of them, and we're real tired. We're thinking of taking it easy for a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wouldn't it be fun, though, to just set up shop here and hang out--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tinker, design--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could repair things for small change on the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah! That's how you could make some money, maybe tinker for a living.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I mean, I haven't tinkered for money before, do you get, what, two, three thousand gold per little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A year, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Per year?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, thereabouts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, tinkering, to be fair, I don't actually know what tinkering pays because I've never been paid to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything that pays much, much more than that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Being a hero and adventuring or being born into privilege.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lot of money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot of money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you know what? I'm ready to set aside money for now, and just live my life and be my own man. Because if I do, when I do eventually go home, I don't want to seem like I'm trying to prove something to him. I just want to be my own man, right? And have him accept me for that, like you all have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well... I mean, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know there's a lot of money in being a man whore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A man whore?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Sell your body, you know? Put that hair to good use.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is true, Taryon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Start making some coin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are a pretty boy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My hair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't actually have to listen to a man who needed an eye mask explained to him, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who will brush my hair at night?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's a conundrum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you know, you could make a new Doty, maybe a smaller Doty, just to brush hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I will. Will you help me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus, you know, if you're wanting to become a more independent and solitary man, then maybe you learn how to brush your own hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As always, wise words, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hell has done something to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, we feel very badly about Doty, obviously, and I hope that you can build a replacement, but in all the years that you were with him, did you ever have a sweetheart or an acquaintance, even?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing to speak of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, if you can push yourself to go to the Nine Hells, you can go out to a tavern with us and meet people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right, get a little funsy action there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you talking about intercourse?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, at the very least we're talking about advanced flirting, at the very least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, that's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Courtship. And Vax over here is a great wingman. Get it? Because he's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could try that out, sure, yeah, that's a great idea. Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Try that out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you-- this is forward, do you go rogue or ranger, or-- Taco or hot dog, or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do not understand what you are saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suppose if there's liquor, we could find out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rogue or ranger!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what, we're going to find out, right? Let's just roll the dice and see where they fall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to learn some slang.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, all right! Yes, let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but seriously, though, the money situation though, like, really, you are paying--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's okay, it's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but, you know, you always said you pay your debts and all that, so you have some, so I just wanted to make sure that that's actually happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we could get to that tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, because I feel really bad for you, I feel bad about everything, and I'm pretty happy for you for being your own man and all of that, I just want to make sure that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's fine. I could probably figure out how much I currently have. It's just, Doty used to keep track of that for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can keep track of it for you, gladly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I insight him to see if this is bullshit, or legitimate tears?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm outta Luck, too. Hold on, hold on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so exciting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to roll against it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll, just roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is worse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, there's no way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doubtful. What did you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we rolling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what did you add? What did you add to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion if you're honest, deception if you're not. Don't tell me which one it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But then tell the number.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five and five! What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five and five? It meets the DC, so tell him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have 34,000 gold pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you said you had a lot of money! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She said, out of accent, appalled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I'm completely out of character!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's my money, Taryon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's so incensed, she dropped accent!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, no, no, I wasn't Vex then!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Vax, here's how it works. In character, Vax, you get the sense that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, Vex or Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As all this is happening, you get the sense that maybe he's not currently worth as much as he leads on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was also curious if the tears felt like crocodile tears, or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, just at that last moment?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, were you really, like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just didn't want to tell her how money I have--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, so it's bullshit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- but before, I'm genuinely sad about Doty!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely, but in this moment, a little bullshitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this moment, a little bullshitty, I think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't read any of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go have a drink!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we still in the middle of farmlands, or are we walking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are in the street, so you're slowly walking through the streets of Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're looking for a pub in particular, the one you usually go to is the Tipsy Quorum, if that's where you're going to get a drink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my favorite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I always forget the name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Old faithful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the best bars where you always forget the name, isn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the way, because this is on the more northern side, northeastern side of Whitestone, you do see there is a crowd of people. What looks to be a caravan is being packed up. There are a number of carts and horses and things are being loaded up for what looks to be some sort of a fairly large travel pack of people. You do hear the laughter of children coming from the right of you, and then pushing through the crowd, you see Odessa, Illya, and Gren Tal'Dorei, the children, go running past as they're being chased by two aasimar boys, blue skin, running past them, and they're giving a joking chase tickle. And all of a sudden one of the kids comes around with a stick, and he stops and puts his hands up, and they all look over and see you guys and immediately get sheepish with their hands to the side. You see Kyor nods, and Hunin nods, the kids go running off again, not really paying attention to you guys--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, go get 'em!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh-huh!" They both continue off after the kids just as Salda Tal'Dorei walks up from between some of the Pale Guard that are currently helping load things onto these carts. And she sees you all, and comes forth, "Oh, my goodness! It's so great to see you all safe and sound!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your majesty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last few times you've seen her, she's looked a little frazzled but still with what remains of her formal attire which she had on her after the attack on Tal'Dorei. Right now, she's dressed very simply. You wouldn't be able to tell her from most of the regular casual farmfolk, and you would have no instinct of the noble lifestyle that she comes from, and it suits her well. She smiles and greets, and gives a respectful bow. "So we're heading back to Emon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They'll be happy to have you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been a while, and now that things have calmed down, and from what we've heard that you've "all saved the city, I guess, we're going to bring the children back to their home. We're going to be "taking the Parchwood Way to the Silvercut Roadway, and we have guardians, we have people we've hired "or have agreed to come along and keep us safe. The children have taken a shine to the boys, as if you "haven't noticed. If it's all right, we're thinking of bringing them with us."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's wonderful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's very kind of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite gracious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have the Alabaster Lyceum-- once it's up and running again, of course-- and I know the "headmaster there. We can provide a good education for the boys, which, upon talking with them, I "think they're both in dire need of."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need any help with that? We feel a bit of responsibility for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really, it's fine. You guys have done enough anyway, and to be honest, I believe your "sister needs your help here more than we could on the journey there."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do your kids-- holding up okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. We've done as best as we could to shield them from the brunt of the past few months, "but things are cheerier here, definitely, and I think they've "taken that upon themselves as well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just be prepared, the Emon you left isn't necessarily the Emon you'll be returning to. It's getting better, but it takes time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But--" and she glances over-- "I think Odessa has a crush on Hunin. I don't want to break her heart "by keeping them too far away, so that's--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cool mom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, I think we're preparing to set out first thing in the morning, and I just want to say "thank you for everything."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any time. Sorry we couldn't do more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've done plenty. I do hope to see you if you decide to still be a part of the Council, "satellite or not."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grayskull is still there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's good to see you all."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good to see you as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances over at you with a curious look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good day."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's new, but he's proving himself quite well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just lost my best friend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry to hear that. That's terrible. I understand the difficulty of loss, "believe you me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it get better?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It does. With people like this around you, people like them around me, it does."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, kind stranger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You as well, kind stranger." She continues walking on and catches up with the kids.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She seems neat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, neat. Neat would be the word I would-- she does all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the most awkward post-conversation conversation I have ever had.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, that's pretty awkward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, there's a pub over there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go get him laid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I see a soldier of any kind, on this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, there's a number of Pale Guard that have been assigned to this caravan that are helping put things onto the various carts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just tapping one. When you're done, please let the palace know that we have returned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yes, of course, sir. It will be done."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've returned for good, for a while, so no immediate threat anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We went to hell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will do this. I will do this immediately."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yells) We'll be in the pub! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right." He finishes putting one of the last bags up and then starts making his way up towards Castle Whitestone. You guys continue your foot journey over to the tavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get on my broom and continue the journey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Had a little too much of Percy's hooch? What's the matter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come on in!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's back, baby! She's back!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah! Hello, everybody!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is in character, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How was traffic?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, hi! Oh, just so terrible!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With the caravan!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello, everybody!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Pike, having come along, as you've been helping out with the reconstruction effort in Emon and was notified that some of the remaining royals of the family of the Sovereign were going to make their way towards Emon, the least you could do was be a part of that. So you ushered a number of the travel carts that were intended for this part of the caravan, since Whitestone had to maintain most of their hardware within the city to remain functional, and you just arrived in the city a few days ago, and as you've been helping these people prepare and organize the whole endeavor, you just watch Vox Machina, your family, walk by and start making their way towards one of the taverns just as the sun's setting. And you rush up to catch up with them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey! Hey! You're just going to walk by?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't even see you! Oh my god!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, hi. Oh, hey! Hey!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, man, Pike! Look! Look who it is!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi, hello Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello. Hello.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're so sorry, we know you really wanted to go to the Hells with us--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We went to hell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're so sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I heard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was awful. You would not have liked it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I imagine it's awful, and I just think I was a little nervous about going there, because I don't know how that would affect me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that seems like a justification, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just selfishly speaking, I feel like maybe it wouldn't have been good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like what? Like, you would have gone dark Pike or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It probably would have been-- Like, you would have gone evil-evil?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe? I feel like it would have affected me in certain ways, or, you know, I just don't know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was very hot!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not a risk we want to take.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, it's probably safe that I didn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, you would have been really hot in your armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it made my cheeks really red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may have eaten some souls.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You have a little bit of a glow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy ate a soul!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You ate a soul? What did it taste like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would you even volunteer that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy signed a contract with a devil!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I may have signed a contract with a devil.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Percy. What do you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we were in hell, it's just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just what you do!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When in hell--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You go to hell--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You go to hell, you sign a contract!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You sign a contract with a devil, I'm never going to do anything with it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, it was mostly just to take care of our little problem, and in return, I have the option of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Selling his soul.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- selling my soul for power that I don't really need, because I have everything I need right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we even tell her why we went to hell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She knows why went to hell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know why.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Hey!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I think, word on the street is that you completed that mission.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did, we did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The word on the street?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We went kitten-smushing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She scries, she sees shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A newsie runs by--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Screaming in terror.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're about to get some alcohol, do you want to join us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Perfect timing! Perfect timing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Extra, extra!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Read all about it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you guys don't mind, just pick up the rest of the carts, all of it. I haven't seen them in so long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All the carts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's being commandeered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. All right, we'll continue. You've done your work for the day."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Important business of state.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So much stuff to do and discuss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's really important.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Yup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense from the guard that he probably wasn't introduced to you before, doesn't know who you are, and figured a gnome probably wouldn't be very helpful putting things into a cart very high up, so what slight hint of racism you might have caught in the undertone of his statement, you're like, whatever, it's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whatever. He was just a little bit rude to me, so I don't really mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who was?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's fine, don't be mad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who? Just point him out! Point him out. He doesn't need his ears anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's just set in his ways.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just feel like he wasn't very appreciative, and I was working very hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You probably were! I see sweat!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And you know how strong I am!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're real strong!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so strong!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What I lack in height, I make up for in strength.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show us the guns.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could beat me in an arm wrestling match! They're huge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those are pythons.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's go drink!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm so sorry. Taryon lost his best friend.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Who was your best--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The big creepy robot that drew us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, no, Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, it's rough. It's rough. But these fellows have told me that they're going to take my mind off it with some flirting tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With some flirting!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh, flirting can take your mind off lots of things.

lines.name: TALIESIN

I say "complex" because it's a series of rooms. There's the main tavern area in which the drinking happens. There's a small eating area that's separate from that, so they keep the localized tavern central area on its own. There's a kitchen, an open kitchen, so all the smoke and the food smell comes just barreling through. It's pretty sparse, mainly because a lot of the people are in the process of helping with the tavern, or they just haven't quite hit that point in the evening. Dusk is when people start finishing their work for the day, and they usually come in in the next couple hours or so. But you do see a couple of the Pale Guard are currently just taking a break. There's a handful of farmhands that are just in there, finishing a small breakfast and having some drinks.
