lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can say that from experience. It means people look at you and expect you to have the "answer, and you--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have all the answers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She leans in and goes, "And you're really just making it up best you can, but you do your "best. But as the Grand Mistress of the Grey Hunt, upon the completion of the Grey Hunt, you are "responsible for overseeing local diplomacy and rooting out mundane and supernatural dangers "throughout the surrounding Parchwood."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To protect the citizens of Whitestone."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm like a guard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. More of a-- what would be the word I would think to use?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vanquisher.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Destroyer of Worlds?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, yeah. Decimator of Beasts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You will be eventually training and be granted a cadre of people beneath you as part of "the Grey Hunt, who you will train and oversee as they ensure that the surrounding Parchwood is safe "in the local area around Whitestone. As you may or may not know, there is a very long history of "dangers within the forest. This entire valley was the result of a cataclysmic conflict during the "Calamity, specifically between the Dawnfather, Pelor, and a very dark entity. As such, there are "still scars of the land that give birth to a multitude of creatures that we need someone to "ensure do not wander far and begin to destroy and threaten our people."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of creatures are we talking? Beholder creatures, or big wolf-type creatures?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Odds and ends. It's less of a guard and more of a champion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your lesser guard keeps watch through patrols, and when something arises, you find it, "learn about it, and if it's necessary, destroy it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! That's no problem. I'm really tough and strong and stuff, so yeah, that sounds fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your skillset actually fits quite well for this, which I understand is why Percival "bequeathed this upon you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll be stronger than the last one, I will say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When was the last one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would have been right before the unpleasantness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. About three years before the Briarwoods' arrival. I, at the time, was much "younger and didn't know much, but Regae, the individual who currently held the position, was "not as respected as I think you will easily become."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was under the Anders house, which is why the Anders house is now forfeit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm so excited! However-- and while I'm still learning this as I go through our family's "history and the structure of governance here in Whitestone, there is-- How do I-- A ritual?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A ceremony that you must undertake."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just me?

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: Just you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Trinket, I imagine, as your companion, could be a part of it. However, as the one to be "titled, this journey is just for you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even Keyleth got friends. No?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we watch?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay, Vex!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The nature of this is a hunt. And I do not believe that your skillsets would aid her in the "speed and tracking that is required for this particular endeavor."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you will be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously! I mean, I'm going to kick serious butt, but what if I don't? What happens then? Do I lose my title? Do I just suck forever? What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you do not succeed, then you will have to wait until the Dawnfather presents the next "opportunity for the Hunt."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When that could--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- when that would be."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait, has the opportunity presented itself now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it's as soon as you wish to go and find your way to the Sun Tree and meditate for the "sign. I don't know the specifics of this. This is just from what the--" And she starts pulling over this cluster of books she had on the side and she starts rummaging through, and she pulls it over and goes: "It's unfortunately very vague. And it's, apparently-- Keeper Yennen might know "more."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's the resident priest of Pelor and this is a ritual of his, but yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wonderful. Well, I'm not intimidated by this at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You'll like the Sun Tree, he's very nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah man, come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, this is great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's right up your alley. Tracking, hunting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's fine. By myself. No big deal. No big deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The things you have done--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to send me out there to die, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hopefully not.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is that a possibility?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Tary. Look at you, you're so strong and knowledgeable now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll go down, learn a little bit more and begin when you're ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Sure, yeah. Great. Well, I shove a bunch of eggs in my mouth and I get up and I'm going to find Keeper Yennen then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Easy enough. You find the central-- The same open, almost-- What's the term I'm looking for? It's the half-domed speaking, presentational--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like an amphitheatre?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Amphitheatre! Thank you, yes, that's the word I was looking for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Words.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see occasionally the accelerated age that recent events has imparted upon individuals of the city. But as he sweeps and notices you arrive, "Oh, yes!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vex'ahlia, thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady Vex'ahlia, Grand Mistress of the Grey Hunt, apparently, which I'm here to talk to you about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Excuse me." And he wanders off and he puts the broom back in this little closet and clutter falls out. "Oh, god-- Just a--". Puts things back up. Closes the closet. Hobbles back in your direction. "You are-- You are the Grand Mistress of the Grey Hunt?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She needs to be appropriately consecrated, obviously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh? I thought that happened last night, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shush now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well." And he starts looking around and pulling up small scrolls and reading through. He goes and rummages through and finds one. "Yes, yes, here it "is. So for the Grand Purveyor of the Grey Hunt, Mistress in this case, is to go into a state of "deep meditation at the base of the Sun Tree and ask for a vision from the great Dawnfather "himself. There will be imparted upon her, at the moment of the Grey Hunt, her quarry. You are then "to find the quarry, wherever it may be within the Parchwood."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And decide the fate of said quarry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all I have."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super explicit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, this explains so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's very clear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Find the thing, decide to do with the thing what you want to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bearing various recovered examples of what they felled."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm supposed to bring back some sort of trophy, then? That would be good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A sign of your victory, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A sign of your victory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever that victory may be. I've read a bit. I know a bit about what's to come.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Well, thank you, Keeper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. If I may be of aid of any kind, let me know. Though I don't know how much aid I "can be in this endeavor. But let me know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good luck." And as you walk, he says, "Dawnfather smile upon you!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you! And you. The Dawnfather's Pelor, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you'll do fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heathen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So what'd he say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm going to go and sit in front of a tree. I'm going to think real hard. I'm going to talk to a god and then I'm going to go kill something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's so cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's the coolest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Looking good, Tary, looking good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you feed it though, she becomes unbearable. Just temper that a little bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay. I don't mind feeding it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When are you going to do this amazing think-real-hard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, fuck it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I buried a secret clubhouse under Whitestone, at the roots of the Sun Tree. And sometimes I go there and I talk to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I remember you doing that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I realise this sounds very uncool when I say it out loud.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, pretty uncool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're supposed to build the treehouse in the top of the tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're so cool, but I totally didn't put the treehouse in the top of the tree. I totally put it underneath the city. But there's a treehouse. There's a clubhouse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like this! Technically, I'm supposed to be at the base of the tree, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can go there and be alone, and it's so quiet and peaceful and dark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if Pelor can't see underground? What if he needs to see me in the sun?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if one of the gods cannot see you underground?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how gods work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think he can see you underground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Although sometimes I do climb into the tree and I hug onto one of the branches--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to follow in before we send you off into this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You walk up and, I mean, the city's starting to slowly spring to life as the morning hours climb forward. People are arriving and putting the last touches on the caravan. The Pale Guard is finished and they've assigned the division between those who are going to stay and those who are to escort the caravan to Emon. Pike, are you with the rest of the party?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I need to see what's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're walking, one of the Pale Guards sees you and walks up and goes, "Lady Pike? Are "you to join us on the caravan?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was today? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're leaving. It's-- I mean, I just don't know."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What-- Oh! What exactly were we doing? I'm sorry, I've had a night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You escorted the caravan from Emon to Whitestone and now we're returning to Emon from "Whitestone with the caravan. I just wanted to know if you wished to come or stay. We're leaving right "now."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm-- No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Great. No, that's all right."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm saying, I've just been waiting for them anyway. I'm going to stay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're-- We're going to go." And he just turns and leaves and runs towards the caravan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Lady Vex'ahlia, you've found yourself at the base of the Sun Tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a beautiful sight. What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you want to say something, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just wanted to let you know that when I sort of sprung this title on you, I chose the Grey Hunt specifically. The Third House is easy, it's just land and title. It doesn't mean anything. As a child, the Grey Hunt was fascinating because it was a title that one earned. And I felt that you should have something like this that no one could do otherwise other than claim that you earned it. This is not something that can be given and you're going to be fine. I have complete faith.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him a big hug and a kiss. I love you, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love you, too. Good luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. All right, get the fuck away from me. I've got to meditate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Backing off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex'ahlia, you find a comfortable place at the base of the tree. You sit, cross your legs, look up, and close your eyes and concentrate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel itchy, but I'm okay. I'm going to stay still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What thoughts are on your mind? What do you wish to do? What is your approach to this meditation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. He said I'm supposed to meditate on the tree? Or on Pelor? I'm going to try thinking about the tree first. A lot. I'm thinking about the leaves swaying and I think about finding a quarry and, you know, hunting things. Then I'm going to start thinking about what it feels like to walk through the woods barefoot and hear the leaves crunching underneath my feet and hear twigs breaking as I hunt creatures and track them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've probably been here for a number of hours at this point. And you're starting to feel the sweat drip beneath the armor. Discomfort's settling in a little bit. And you're beginning to feel that conscious difficulty with separating what your mind is trying to do and what your body is telling you it's not enjoying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I should've learned Speak With Plants from Keyleth. I'm going to sink down and I'm going to take my armor off and try to feel the bark beneath my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's growing colder, the breeze has picked up a bit, and you see some clouds making their way slowly from the wind of the southwest, cresting over the mountains on the western side, the Alabaster Sierras. No vision, no words. You can start seeing now people are walking the street, watching you strangely as they pass. You hear horse hooves hitting as they pass by with carts and people stop and stare and awkwardly whisper to each other and keep walking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This sucks. Is anybody around that I know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where the little treehouse was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can I help you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, actually. Don't mind me, I just have a treehouse to get to. And I walk through and go under.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Middle of the road.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Okay. The guy looks at you and goes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wink at him, keep walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, I have no idea what that means, but--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you like it. You like it. And I keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're going to send Joseph, just to keep an eye. Joseph?" And this one guy turns around and he looks a little touched. He turns around and goes, "Okay! I'll follow her."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Joseph? If you could wait at the door, that would be really helpful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can do that!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Joe, who seems to be a really sweet guy probably in his mid-to-late 30s, shaved head that's just starting to come in a little bit, square jaw, but it's Slingblade-style hung off to one side a little. But he seems like he's a fair worker and intent on the job that is set before him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're doing good work, Joseph!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you!" And he follows you in as you enter the tunnel and begins to walk in the tunnel with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At the door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah! Right! This isn't a door."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) All right. Keep walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I go, I want to put my hands on the roots and I'm going to say, hey, Sun Tree! I know I can't hear you, but I really need your help right now. And I hope you can hear me. I don't know how to do this, exactly, but I need to talk to Pelor, and there's a lot of people that are looking at me like I know what I'm doing, but I have no freaking clue. So if you could help guide me, that would be great. I sit down and I keep my hands on the roots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you concentrate and keep your hands on the roots, time passes, what seems like ten, 20, 30, 60 minutes of silence, occasionally broken by a voice down the hallway going, "You okay?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're an individual who likes being bombarded with sensory elements. You're a person who needs to know what's going on around you, you always have been. That sense of self-preservation, paranoia, whatever you want to call it, is being conflicted heavily with the idea of being still, quiet, and focused for a protracted period of time. You're battling that antsiness, you are far too conscious of your physical body and the discomfort you're feeling. I want you to go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God damn it! Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? You can feel the pain begin to rise from sitting for so long. Your pelvic bone, from being in that position for a long period of time, is beginning to grow more and more sore. You begin to shift in place and as you do, it doesn't help. So you shift again, that doesn't help. And every single position you try and shift, it seems to throb in pain from being stationary for so long in a position that you're not used to. It's distracting to you. Eventually a voice comes through down the hallway that goes, "All right, we're done and we're leaving. You good?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, Joseph. You know what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks! For everything, have a good night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You too!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You okay in there?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm great, you can go. You can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Looks scary."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not. But don't come down here, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, have a good night, miss!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the footsteps grow quieter and quieter and then a (kch) as the hatch that led to the basement that you carved the tunnel from closes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Trinket here with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is in your necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pop that fucker out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very tight space. There's now a big bear and you're like (rrr) on the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi! Sorry about that. Are you okay? Are you comfy? Are you all right? Is this too big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Backs up into the tunnel partway and is now borderline Winnie the Pooh in the tree. Trinket's like fitting in there, but snugly, but is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cat trying to squeeze in the shoebox.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much can you stay still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Speak with Animals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Winnie the Pooh voice) Oh, bother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can, I can be still."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you come over here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I guess." Crawls forward back into the space, ducking his head under the various tree roots like, (grunts)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to just lay down, dear, I'm just going to lean on you. I just need you right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beautiful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lean back into Trinket and the warmth is comforting, as it is getting colder here, especially beneath the earth in a space that, aside from the natural earth insulation, the cold of the night of Whitestone does get pretty biting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The warmth is welcome. And you think back and you have really no sense of what time it is, you really don't. You have no idea how long you've been in there. It could have been minutes, hours, it's hard to tell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's days down here, Trinket. We're imprisoned forever! This fucking title! I thought I wanted it! I thought I did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket goes, "Really?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want to stay here forever."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's not going to be forever, eventually we'll get sick of it, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we'll leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket kind of falls asleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to keep thinking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're thinking about this, you're leaning back into Trinket. The warmth is comforting. Make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Girl!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, girl!

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then you sense that there's a reason for this emergence, and at that point you watch as the creature, which is now maybe up to its waist, pushing onto knee-depth in the water, as it reaches the edge of the surface. You don't see its face, you just see over its shoulder and its massive back, no head emerging over top. It stops and turns back, and as the shoulder turns you can see the head, which is actually protruding forward out of the torso, this slumped plated armored head with a jaw that hinges underneath closed with a series of teeth in the bottom, and what you see for just a glimmer are its yellow eyes glowing, all six of them, in rows of two across the top as it glances back in your direction. And it just leaps out of the water and begins darting through trees and vanishing in the distance, and you realize the Hunt is on. Your vision comes back to you, there's no vines, and Trinket is just sleeping behind you, and you're there in the cold darkness beneath the Sun Tree. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) It worked! It worked! You are awesome, Sun Tree! You're the best! Pelor, that is some fucked up shit. Okay. Trinket, wake up! We have to go hunt a thing that looks really scary! I'm going to die! How about you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Um. Hopefully not?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.text: You don't know of a scent, per se. Go ahead and roll an investigation check to look back over the memory of what you have and pick out details.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, okay. Best you can tell, given the circumstances, the brief vision you had, the angle of the moonbeams are coming from the right and left, meaning from your perspective, they're coming at this angle upon the water. And as you step out into the night, you can see the moon is in a certain place in the sky where your vision, if that is in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I turn that way, it'll be coming at me this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depending on if it's in a northern direction or not. You're trying to think of where the lake was. There are a couple of ponds that you've seen in the forest. You're not fully aware. Percival might be the person to ask about this.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: As you dart out, Trinket lumbering after you, you look at the map, and based on the conversation you had as well, there are two different locations that have ponds roughly the size that your vision revealed to you. Both of them have a slight break in the canopy. That's a key that you remember from this, and being a tracker specifically you know that most of the forest, the Parchwood itself, is very dense canopy, it rarely has breaks enough to allow that much moonlight to pass through. I need you to go ahead and make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: 33, okay. Very quietly, you dart up into the trees and begin leaping from broken branch to broken branch. Eventually it leads you into a small opening between a series-- the trees here are truly thick, but there's certain areas where they begin to separate a bit, and you can see heavy impacts where it leapt down and found some soft ground and begins running. And you can see the tracks, and you take a moment and study these tracks, and you can see exactly how these thick three-toed feet of the creature dig into the dirt, and you take a very, very close watch on them. I need you to go ahead and make another wisdom survival check to see where those footfalls will take you.

Out of the right of you, you hear a sudden noise, and you are surprised, as a series of birds come fluttering past you, apparently startled from something nearby, and you watch as a forest elk darts past and is a sign of-- you know, naturally in this environment-- of relatively recent movement. And you get the sense that you might be gaining on this creature, whatever it's charging.

lines.text: That doesn't hit me.

lines.text: 28 does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 for the arrow, plus three lightning damage, plus six for the Hunter's Mark, and I don't get another Sneak Attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just once per round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the Blazing Bowstring is another seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 67 total damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not fucking bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's not bad at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure the thing is on the verge of death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that ends your turn? You've used all your actions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I don't speak English."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The creature glances over at Trinket behind, looks up at you in the tree and in a creepily humanoid way, wipes the edge of its jaw and then leaps off this tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket gets a swipe at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, he does. And then it leaps in your direction in the sky. (impact, roar) Arms out, jaw open. Make the attack for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he likes me, y'all. What is it, a bite attack or a claw attack? Does it matter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whichever one you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits! Go ahead and roll damage for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's my d6?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That yellow one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That hits me, motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You suffer 19 points of piercing damage, and I need you to make an athletics or acrobatics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great. That is a 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34. The jaw attempts to pull you from the broom. The strength of its grasp on you is extremely heavy. You sense that this is a grapple rend technique that it has. However, you manage to squeeze out of its teeth and elbow it as you push it off with your foot, releasing the grasp. You are not grappled by the creature. However, on its way down, it's going to swing out with its claws as you push it off. That's a natural one. Two natural ones in a row! (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he falls to the ground and he hurts himself.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And dies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He definitely plummets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, a tree falls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two ones in a row.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two ones in a fucking row!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No dice jail for that one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is my go-to die. This is the fan-given die. I use this for everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to do something. This is all fucking concentration, so I can't do shit. I'm going to go up higher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hope that I'm going out of his range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going full up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we'll say you're going 30 feet up from where you were. You're up in this direction there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and I'm going to shoot him. (laughs) I'm going to shoot him twice! 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 does hit, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Okay, that's 16 plus two lightning damage, plus one for Hunter's Mark. But I do get Sneak Attack because Trinket's next to him, right? Well, I run Trinket up to him. How about that? I run Trinket up to him. So a six for the Sneak Attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six damage for Sneak Attack. Got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to, for my bonus action, have Trinket attack him with a bite attack before I send off my second arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. I need you to roll a concentration check, by the way, for your Hunter's Mark. Because you took damage for each of those hits. You've got to remember that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. A 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So just roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? It would have been-- That's fine for the first one. Roll again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's that one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's lower, that's four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four? Yeah, so Hunter's Mark-- Actually, that last Hunter's Mark would not have hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay, it was just one anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget to remember that. My fault.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I don't do that very often.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, it's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's attack was 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So that's 12 for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to do my second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that is 20-something, which hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay! I hope he can't get up this high! Ten, 11, 12! Plus four lightning damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And no Sneak Attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see as it looks around, it's glancing in the vicinity for what it can do. Ending your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say, so I mean, what are you doing out here? I mean, do you work for Pelor? Is this, like, a thing you do all the time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Ask her name! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your sign?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're saying this, you watch the creature. Trinket's hassling it from the back, it pushes off, looks over, grabs the tree that just fell and picks it up and throws it in your direction. Which, it makes a strength check to do so. That is a 21 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, son of a Gern!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You went up higher!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I'm going to die, I'm going to fall and die if I get knocked off this fucking broom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're like those Weather Fail videos, you got hit by a tree!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) My sister in the woods--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take 17 points of bludgeoning damage. As the tree strikes you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nightmare on Elm Street.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to go ahead and-- let's see--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should have had a Feast or something before. I should have talked to you, and had you inspire me. Yeah, I should've thought about those things. I was really excited about going and hunting things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, well, now you know. So as the tree impacts you, it's threatening to knock you off the broom. Even though it'll remain attached to you, it's a tumble. I need you to go ahead and-- Oh man, this'll be an interesting DC. Make a strength check to hold yourself on the broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Strength check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is to see if from the impact you can still hold on to the broom or be knocked from it. Or a strength saving throw, is what it would be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not a 20, that's a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a ten. You are thrown from the broom from the impact, and immediately tumble--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the tree!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- the tree that fell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To another tree! Because it hit me and it kind of changed the trajectory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you hit a series of branches on the way down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket sees it happening and he runs over and he saves me and everything's fine and I am still the Grand Mistress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you plummet, the broom, as you're not on it to gun it, it goes limp, and you just tumble as it's currently dangling from the chain that's attached to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I grab it as I'm falling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Character development!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You land prone on the ground and suffer 15 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You gotta potion? Fucking down a potion, man! Do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She can heal herself on a good day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She better now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a step forward. Trinket does get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It gets to attack again even though it threw something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it just moves up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now looming over you, threatening. That was its full action, was throwing the tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, and you know what I just remembered? It doesn't matter, he gets a crit on 19s before and he got a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, now you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Triple the dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so that's a bite attack. Triple the dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's just fucking with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it, I was real excited.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's really quadruple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16. Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that doubled?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's doubled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that was doubled? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's biting! It's a bite!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look, it's awesome!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a bear!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he lashes out and gets a big chunk, you see Trinket goes (roars) and steps up and is now looming over you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, buddy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) Your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say, why are we doing this? Why are we even fighting? Is this a thing? Is this a thing? Should we talk about this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you trying to talk to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, would I use my whole turn to try to talk to him as I disengage, can I try to stand up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're making quips, that's fine, but if you're trying to actually converse with and get through to a creature, that'll be your action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuckballs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you Peter Parkering?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a bad idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Vex'ahlia? Your choice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I roll out of the way of him, right? 'Cause he's looming over me, is he within--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is looming over you. You are prone on the ground next to him. So you can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I disengage out of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you disengage as a bonus action, and you can move three squares away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get up, there you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How the fuck? What the fuck am I going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kobayashi Maru, you got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your action, still. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- I mean-- I already used a bonus action to disengage, so I can't take a healing potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got your broom still, or is the broom--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The broom is attached, it's dragging behind me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dragging behind her by the ankle, it's like (shuffling noise).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Action plus movement, you can double movement away, up in the air. Away from this motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or you can use your action to heal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but then he'll just attack me again!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high can you go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shoot him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to commit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shoot him twice as I'm staring at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say this is-- This is not the kind of Hunt that I am used to! And I try to shoot him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you do anything to knock him prone or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I guess I don't have any kind of concentration up anymore because I got fucking destroyed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have destroyed dragons, tree men, hearts...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are all bonus, though. Really, I can't do shit. I kind of suck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fenthras? Can't Fenthras do something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fenthras can do Bramble Shot, which I already did. 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 just barely hits.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Misses or hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket ran up as I was saying that! Plus two Sneak Attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's going to run up and take his swipe while I'm doing this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, no, I used my bonus action to disengage. Trinket can't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yeah. So you only get your two attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, okay. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is bad, this is bad, this is bad, guys. This is super bad. 14, 15, 16, oh, that doesn't count, 16, plus two lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 18? 18 points of damage. All right. You watch as all these arrows (whoosh) sink into his body, its abdomen, its knee, one of the knees kind of buckles a little bit, it's like (grunts) you can see now it's visibly hurt, it's bleeding from a lot of places and as it stands back up, its knee shakes from the impact, and as its knee locks into place the arrow that you just shot snaps from the hide clicking together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to put my arms down and stare at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you stare at it as it just looms towards you, and as it gets, stepping up to you now, your standing position, it's a good four feet taller than you. Trinket gets another attack of opportunity as it moves towards you, not even focusing on your companion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Double crit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 just misses. Trinket swipes and hits the back but just skids off the hide leaving these scratch marks but no real damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it looms forward, it's going to go ahead and take its multi-attack on you. It just looks at you and it goes (cracks) and you hear its knuckles crack, these thick (cracks) as it brings its fists into giant angry punches and swings the first claw towards you. That is a four plus nine, 13. Misses you. Cocked. That is an eight plus nine, that is 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't hit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bite attack, that is 27.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That definitely hits. Dodge, dodge, dodge, ugh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't watch, I can't watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have Uncanny Dodge yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have Uncanny Dodge yet, that's level five or seven or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yells) Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm alive, I'm alive, I'm alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is that true?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, she's alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make another athletics or acrobatics check, as its jaws are now clamping onto you, attempting to grapple you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's trying to grapple me? 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fucking this guy cannot roll for shit when it counts-- okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, neither can I!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go! So the jaws clamp on you, and you just muscle and squeeze out. You can feel the teeth tear against your flesh between the bits of your leather armor. As you pull away, the armor snaps open on its hinges and you now have your bloodied shoulder exposed in the moonlight right now in the canopy. As it's there, you're heaving, it's kind of heaving, staring you down. What are you going to do? It's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to have Trinket run up and I'm going to, fuckin' A, have to disengage, and run the fuck away, 'cause that's all I can do. I'm going to disengage and run as far towards that tree circle as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you move, with disengage, you can go around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where you can get, right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So I want Trinket in front of me, and then I'm going to take two more shots at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is it, this is it, do or die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I'm going to die if I don't do this! Okay, that hits, that hits, that's 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay. 12, 13, 14... 14, 15, 16, two for lightning damage, and then six for the Sneak Attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the creature is wounded, it's breathing heavy, it's standing there, and as you rush past, it turns around and stands tall again, looking back at you. As you have the arrow in your sights and you release it, the arrow is-- What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want it to be fatal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, okay. So what are you doing with the arrow, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hit 'em with the feather end?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tickle, tickle, tickle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Boop! Boop him on the nose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to get him in the shoulder, up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just (heavy breathing).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is standing right in front of him, eyeing him down. And I say, you're a noble creature, sent here for a reason. Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's very little response, it's just standing there looking at you. You can see the eyes are focused on you even through the slight glimmers of yellow, even though some of them are lulling and blinking. Its muscles are tensing and relaxing as it's just taking all of its strength to stay partially standing at this moment, but it's listening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can leave. You can go back to where you came from. I protect this forest now. This is mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make just a straight charisma roll. Just adding your charisma modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm scared of all of my dice right now! Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use Liam's!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right? Straight charisma. Seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right? It's not a saving throw, it's just a check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a check, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to throw up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It stands up. It almost falls again on its knee, grasps, and puts its arm over where the last arrow went in. It turns around, and leaps back into the forest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It can leap? No! It leaves? I take the final arrow before it gets away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to throw up. Sorry this is so late, guys. 15, 16, 17, plus two lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just right between the shoulder blades.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits. You think it hit. You don't hear anything. Quiet. And then the heaviest boulder-like impact of its body onto the forest ground, skidding into the mud, hitting another tree. That tree falls on top, and you have to dodge onto the side to make sure that nothing else falls in the area. And then stillness and calm and quiet hits, and the cold finally comes in. As the blood is pumping and the adrenaline's hitting you, you felt so warm and you're sweating, and at that point as you're breathing in heavily, you can feel the biting cold of the air hitting your lungs, and at that point the adrenaline begins to subside, and you notice your breath is showing up and it is a very cold low mist night now emerging within the forest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up and I scratch Trinket on the head. You did real good there, bud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not dead! And I cast Cure Wounds on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I walk over and try to find a fucking trophy on this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arrow sticking out of the back, the final blow, seems to have hit a very core nerve center of its back. So carve whatever trophy you wish from its body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to cut his hand off. I'm going to cut his hand off, no biggie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you eventually pull out a small dagger and hack the hand off. It takes you a little while but you do manage to get it. The hand alone probably weighs almost as much as you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez! This was maybe the wrong sort of trophy to grab, okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket walks over and takes it up in his jaws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. You're really strong, did you know that? And I guess I'm going to-- You don't have to carry it just yet, 'cause I want to set fire to the body and burn it. I'm going to use some of the branches from the trees he fucking knocked over to set a fire around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice that, because this area is very thickly wooded, setting a fire in the middle of the Parchwood Forest, probably not a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm going to do it in that opening right there. Look at that. I guess I can't, because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You try and tug the creature, and even with Trinket's help, this thing weighs two tons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like, as a hunter, I would know how to set a fire to something without setting fucking fire to the trees. I'm good at campfires.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom survival check. No advantage on this one. You would have disadvantage, so it's negated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But this is her favored terrain!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yo! This is survival?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Survival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. It takes you the better part of the evening, but you manage to set a very localized flame around this, making sure you have very, very damp moss and bits of wet mud caked around to make sure the flame doesn't spread. Eventually the body does begin to burn, and by the time you finish and you feel successful, you notice the faint glimmer of morning sun beginning to crest over the mountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet everyone thinks we're dead. Hey, Pelor. Pelor? I don't know if I'm saying your name wrong. Thanks for that, and I'll be here next time you send something my way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, bruised, beaten, you and Trinket find your way back to Whitestone. You stumble up just as everyone's coming everyone's coming to consciousness. The worrying has kept you up, and you've been--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've known, the necklace hasn't gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Eventually, as you guys are getting breakfast and discussing if anyone had seen you, you watch as Vex'ahlia stumbles in, bloodied, bruised, filthy, and Trinket stumbles in beneath and just chucks this giant gray severed hand of a creature (thuds) onto the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And she's great with money, and-- Oh look, she's back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! You look awesome! I mean, you look like shit, but you look awesome!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who has a mimosa?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We-- all-- here. You look great! That thing looks so heavy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The staff scatters to make you mimosas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so heavy, I couldn't pick it up! Trinket had to carry it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did that belong to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was this big weird rhino-y thing with six eyes. I tried to talk to him, but he just didn't want to listen, and I swear, he almost fucking killed me. I didn't want him to know--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you handed his ass to him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, yeah. I set fire to him for you, bud!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would I know anything with six eyes? Big rhino thing with six eyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you've read around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What am I rolling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be a general intelligence check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a general intelligence check? 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. As soon as she says that, you're like, this is a gray render.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You killed a gray render.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I asked you! I asked you before I left, Do you know of anything that's gray with six eyes, and you didn't know, and now you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeing the hand triggered it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's-- that's interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was really, really tough to kill, you guys. If we had been there together, no problem, insta-death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you know of grey renders is, they are asexual creatures that reproduce only one, asexually, per generation. They are territorial and very protective of their young, and generally sometimes bind themselves as a protector of a certain territory, and given certain circumstances, can choose either an individual or a space to protect as well. But that can depend on circumstances, otherwise they can be a dangerous force of nature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, does that mean it was a good guy? Did I kill a good thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That means it was natural, it didn't have a good or bad aspect to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean it's got a baby somewhere in the woods and I just didn't know about it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe, maybe not. That means that you were sent, and that you did what you thought was right. This thing could have been a terrible danger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't second-guess yourself! You're alive! You did good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, yeah. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus, it's kind of cool that you killed something called a gray render to become Lady of the Grey Hunt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- of the Grey Hunt, totally. Hey, that makes sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, that is a thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you did it by yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Imma throw up. No, I'm okay. No I'm going to throw up. No, I'm good. I'm just going to drink my mimosa.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I need sleep. It's been a while. I'm going to go lay down. I love you guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so glad you're here, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to take my sister to bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very proud of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Way to bring it all back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. Can I have that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel really-- can you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a-- Do they do something with this trophy, or is that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is the property of whoever succeeds at the Grey Hunt, it is their trophy to mount, to utilize or discard as they please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can Grog lift it okay, I guess? He's probably the only one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can lift it fine. You have a 26 strength, you're like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A message from beyond! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're walking downstairs, Cassandra, who's awake and in her nightwear, groggily steps down the stairs and sees you. "Oh, um, how's it gone?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It went great, no problems at all. Totally took care of the problem in the woods, and you are safe, and so is all of Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So it's a success?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, great, grand success, by a mile, just totally a success.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little woozy, but she did her thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a half-elf, you're average size, but she is pretty short for a human, especially for the amount of personality she wields. But she looks up at you and says--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) The amount of personality she wields, is what you just did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, I swear to god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are children!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks up at you and says, "Congratulations. Welcome to the chamber."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Our Mistress of the Grey Hunt."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Glad to be here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pats your cheek. "Anyway, I'm going to get some breakfast. And--" she looks down and notices the somewhat congealed blood that's now spattered across parts of her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Sorry about that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, welcome."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I'm glad." She walks back up to her chamber to change outfit. You guys continue on to see Vex to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's get you into bed, yeah? Get some sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so funny, I had this vision when he said Grey Hunt, I was going to charge in and be so amazing and maybe wear a top hat as I was doing it, you know, just to be really badass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A top hat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you know, something very hunt-y, a sort of thing--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can picture it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I tried to talk to it, and it just didn't sound like it was listening to me, and then it went away, and it might have been going away, 'cause I asked it to go away?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm opening the door to her room and leading her in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, how many more times am I going to have to fucking do that? Hopefully not a lot, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe not ever again, that's what it sounded like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could be years.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could be years.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, let's get you undone. I start undoing the braid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fenthras just drops to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sinaeth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, in bed, in bed, in bed. Don't fall asleep yet, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm listening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep going. I'm not sleeping, I'm just closing my eyes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck, I love you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you did it, you did the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. You've carved out a little spot for yourself here, for now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, yeah, I guess so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the second half of that conversation. We have nothing left to do in the short term.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you love Percival. And Percival loves you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So much, like, he's just so in love.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No duh, no duh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I love Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Kiki loves me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to set a time on it, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're leaving?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are going to stay here for a while. Yes, and you're welcome to come with me, but I don't think you want to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I had hoped we'd have the Gate Stone for this moment, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, are you fucking leaving now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, no, no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, don't jump ahead of yourself. I just meant, we have work to do. I'm going to go to Zephra, and you're going to be nobility?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't fucking know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's funny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How stupid is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a little bit. But you wear it really well. Really well. You're classier than I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, you know, I'm going to get some dresses made, it's no big deal. Imma be so classy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to go, you're going to stay here. But now we have some homework to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About what? About--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Keyleth can get us anywhere when we need.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she's super, super badass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you and I need to-- Well, we need to enjoy ourselves, you need to enjoy yourself, but we also need to meet up and do a little research, because-- Calm down, you made the offer, not me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I know! I'm an idiot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So am I.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) This is so stupid!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we need to spend a little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are we making plans for it? I mean, I'm so excited about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're making plans for it because she is not done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I do!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She spoke to me, Vex. Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're all, all of them are tied up in this, and we need to have some idea of what we're doing, because whatever just happened is just a test run in her eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you mean, hell? I know! No, all of it, right? The dragons, everything, I know what you're talking about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! The thing is, what are we going to do? We don't know when she's going to cash in on this!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, it could be a decade from now. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly! So what are you going to do? Live a decade going, the Raven Queen's expecting something, or are you going to live a decade going, well here's my fuck-all life, I'm enjoying it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both of those things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! Good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to enjoy myself, but just in case it's sooner rather than later, you and I need to do a little bit of homework, which you were very good at in school.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm awesome at homework and killing giant gray things. I can't remember its name anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) Render.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Renders.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to Zephra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When? Why do you keep saying it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eventually. Eventually. Because it hurts, because I love you, because you are-- Stop, stop laughing for a minute. You are my best friend. You are my twinnie. And only you know what that means. Hm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're always here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll still be here. I'll still be there. It's going to suck giant dick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how to do anything without you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're learning already.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm very proud of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to get married? I think you should. I feel like you're going to do it, I feel like it's going to happen. I just want to be there for the wedding. Don't go off in secret and do it, all right? I would be very pissed. I love you. Let me sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Do you need to yak before you go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nah, I'm going to yak in my sleep. I'm going to lay on my side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That sounds bad! Good night, good night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See you in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as elements of the vines and the curves and the designs of Fenthras seem to almost grow and curl even further. The bow seems to have established a more prominent visual presentation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) You're going to have a very good morning. Good night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as Vox Machina completes the final legs of their recent journeys, they come, for the first time in a long time, to a period of local and nationwide peace, with much to pick up, much to clean, much to rebuild, and much to discover for themselves, their relationships, and what it means to each individual. You guys have a few weeks to contemplate what it is you do together and individually over the next year. When we return in about two weeks to Critical Role proper, it's going to be a little over a year later from this moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's going to be fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all going to be here for a one shot!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Conan coming? Is Conan O'Brien--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get him and Colbert to guest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Welcome back, Ashley! Now you have to wait a year to play again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One year later, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll see where that takes us in two weeks for the story of Vox Machina into the final arc of your story. And return next week for the awesome one-shot. I'm super excited. I've never been able to play with most of you guys at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's exciting!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty rad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think, like, Satine ran a game, like a half a decade ago that we played in together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're RPing as yourself! That's what's weird!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if Matt sucks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to! I'm going to be so bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if he's awful?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to be okay in the DM's chair, but I am the worst player.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's like, "What does favored terrain get me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, bitch!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not going to lie, I'm a rules lawyer. Bit of a rules lawyer. So memorize your fucking Player's Handbooks, you amateurs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure you already know this and you probably have known for a couple hours. But, anyway, congratulations, you won the awesome package.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How de dur de dur?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How de do dis?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until then, rest well, and is it Thursday yet? Have a good night, guys! [music]
